title: SnapSchool Web App
info: SnapSchool is a single-page Photography Course Selling web app with a minimalistic UI and fast loading time. Users can log in, enroll in courses, and make credit card purchases. Admins can manage classes, users, and assign instructors. The front-end uses React, React Router Dom, Daisy UI, Tailwind, and CSS3. The back-end includes Firebase Auth, MongoDB, Express.js, and React Stripe. Additional packages like React Hook Form, React Awesome Reveal, React Helmet, and React Spinner enhance the user experience

title: Restro Recipe web App
info: Restro food is a single-page Restaurant/Food recipe web app with a minimalistic UI. Users can log in, browse food recipes, and learn cooking methods. The front-end utilizes React, React Router Dom, Daisy UI, Tailwind, and CSS3. The back-end uses Firebase Auth and Express.js for user authentication. It provides a quick loading time and seamless user experience.

title: Turbo Toy web App
info: Turbo Toy is a single-page Children Toys web app with a minimalistic UI. Users can log in, create, update, and delete product listings. The front-end uses React, React Router Dom, Daisy UI, Tailwind, and CSS3. The back-end incorporates Firebase Auth, MongoDB, and Express.js. It ensures quick loading times and a seamless user experience.
